title: Man Utd fans love Marcus Rashford 'bullying' Virgil van Dijk during Liverpool clash
text:
Marcus Rashford sent Virgil van Dijk flying to the turf (Getty Images)

Manchester United fans loved the moment Marcus Rashford got the better of Virgil van Dijk during their clash with Liverpool at Old Trafford.

Jurgen Klopp’s side struggled to get going in the opening half and it was Rashford who put Ole Gunnar Solskjaer’s men in front with a finish from close range, although Liverpool felt aggrieved as Divock Origi appeared to have been fouled in the build up to the goal.

But Rashford gave United supporters something to cheer about before his opening goal as he sent Van Dijk flying to the turf with an impressive show of strength.

Time to get this trending on Arsenal Twitter now.#WelcomeTorreira ❤️ — Shivam (@thukralshivam) July 6, 2018

The first half got even worse for Liverpool as Sadio Mane thought he had equalised before the goal was ruled out due to handball following a VAR check.

Rashford showed impressive strength to shrug off Van Dijk (Getty Images)

But United fans couldn’t get enough of seeing Rashford out-muscle Van Dijk.
